product_name: Fox Head Inc Digit Bike Gloves - Men's
long_description: The men's Digit Bike Gloves from Fox provide cushy neoprene knuckle and finger protection as well as plenty of lightweight mesh for maximum airflow on warm days. Synthetic-leather palm offers exceptional grip and hand-to-bike connection. Silicone fingertip prints enhance grip. Absorbent, micro-suede thumb wiping surface. Digit Bike Gloves from Fox feature a low-profile wrist-tab closure that slides easily under a shirt or jacket cuff.
short_description: The men's Digit Bike Gloves from Fox provide cushy neoprene knuckle and finger protection as well as plenty of lightweight mesh for maximum airflow on warm days.
